gobblin.data.management.retention.action

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(List<DatasetVersion> allVersions)
             throws IOException
        Applies selectionPolicy on allVersions and modifies permission/owner to the selected DatasetVersions where necessary.

        This action only available for FileSystemDatasetVersion. It simply skips the operation if a different type of DatasetVersion is passed.

        Execute the action on all DatasetVersions or a subset of DatasetVersions. Each Dataset uses the VersionFinder to find all the DatasetVersions and calls this method to perform the necessary action on those DatasetVersions

        Note Any kind of VersionSelectionPolicy has NOT been applied to the list of DatasetVersions being passed. It is the responsibility of the RetentionAction to filter the DatasetVersions by applying VersionSelectionPolicys and then perform the action.

        Specified by:
        execute in class RetentionAction
        Parameters:
        allVersions - list of all DatasetVersions found by the DatasetsFinder.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        RetentionAction.execute(java.util.List)
